  • Help

    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractGameController
    An abstract base class for game controllers in the framework.
    AbstractGameModel
    An abstract base class for game models in the AOOP Project framework.
    ConsoleInputStrategy
    An InputStrategy that reads user input from the console.
    DifficultyLevel
    Represents the predefined difficulty levels for SameGame.
    Direction
    Represents the four cardinal directions for movement in a grid-based game like Sokoban.
    GameAction
    Represents an action performed by the player or system within the game.
    GameEntity
    Represents a generic entity that can exist on the game's Grid.
    GameEvent
    Represents an event that occurs within the game, typically originating from the AbstractGameModel.
    GameFactory
    Defines a factory for creating the core components of a game.
    GameObserver
    Defines the contract for an observer that wishes to be notified of changes in a AbstractGameModel.
    GameState
    Represents a snapshot of the game's state, including the grid configuration and the current score.
    GameStatus
    Represents the various statuses a game can be in.
    GameView
    Defines the contract for a game view in the MVC/Observer pattern.
    Grid<T>
    Represents the game board as a 2D grid of GameEntity objects.
    HighScoreManager
    Manages high scores for different difficulty levels of a game.
    HintRequestAction
    Represents an in-game action where the player requests a hint to determine the next optimal move.
    InputStrategy
    Defines a strategy for obtaining user input or game actions.
    KeyboardInputStrategy
    An InputStrategy that captures keyboard arrow key presses for movement.
    MainApplication
    The main application entry point for the AOOP Project.
    MouseInputStrategy
    An InputStrategy that captures mouse clicks on a SameGameViewSwing.GamePanel.
    NewGameAction
    Represents a game action triggered when the user opts to start a new game session.
    QuitAction
    A game action that signals the player's intention to exit the current game session.
    SameGameController
    Controller for the SameGame.
    SameGameFactory
    Concrete factory for creating all necessary components for the SameGame.
    SameGameModel
    Implements the game logic for SameGame.
    SameGameModel.PredefinedColors
    Helper inner class to define a palette of standard colors for the game tiles and a placeholder color for empty slots created during internal game logic (e.g., after gravity or column compaction).
    SameGameModel.SameGameTilePosition
    Helper inner class to represent a tile's position (row and column) on the game grid.
    SameGameSelectAction
     
    SameGameSoundObserver
    Observes SameGameModel events and plays corresponding sound effects.
    SameGameTile
    Represents a single tile in the SameGame.
    SameGameViewConsole
    A console-based view for the SameGame.
    SameGameViewSwing
    A Swing-based graphical view for the SameGame.
    ScoreEntry
    Represents a single high score entry.
    SokobanBaseType
    Represents the static base type of a tile on the Sokoban game board.
    SokobanFactory
    Concrete factory for creating all necessary components for the Sokoban game.
    SokobanModel
    Implements the game logic for the Sokoban puzzle game.
    SokobanMoveAction
    Represents a game action where the player attempts to move in a specific direction in the Sokoban game.
    SokobanOccupant
    Represents a movable entity or lack thereof that can occupy a Sokoban tile.
    SokobanTile
    Represents a single tile on the Sokoban game board.
    SokobanViewSwing
    A Swing-based graphical view for the Sokoban game.
    UndoAction
    A game action that allows the player to revert the last performed move.
